com.zebra.sdk.printer

Class FontConverterZpl

  • Object
    • com.zebra.sdk.printer.FontConverterZpl

  • public class FontConverterZpl
extends Object
    A class used to convert TrueType速 fonts for use on ZPL printers.

    • Method Summary

        public static InputStream getTtfFontHeader(InputStream sourceStream,
                           String pathOnPrinter)
        Returns an InputStream which provides the TTF header information as determined from the source stream.
        Parameters:
        sourceStream - Stream containing TrueType速 font data
        pathOnPrinter - Location of the font file on the printer.
        Returns:
        Header information for the provided stream
